name: Catch N Shoot 2 Free
description:
Put yourself in the shoes of a sharp shooting photographer with the task of taking underwater pictures of fishes … yes that’s right, the beautiful sea life! We are talking about rockfish, tuna, triggerfish, angelfish, etc. Each level will have 1 or more targets for you to catch and shoot a picture with your camera. The fastest you capture all your targets and with the less number of shoots taken the higher your score. But be careful, there are sharks in the ocean and they can be scary and intimidating.

The game contains many fish species, many beautiful underwater environments, and many levels to enjoy. You can control your camera using your device motion sensors (Accelerometer / Compass), using the D-pad, or just swiping on the screen. There are 3 difficulty levels to try (easy, normal and hard), you can adjust the camera shooting button (left/right), and enable vibration when you see a shark (if available on your device). The game also has some educational information for you to get to know your fishes!

So go ahead and enjoy this unique photograph shooting action game!

NOTE: More levels are on the way …
